wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==February==
* '''[[24 February|24]]''' - ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part One]]'', the first book of ''[[The History of Middle-earth]]'', is published in the US.
* '''[[27 February|27]]''' - [[Michael Tolkien]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s second son, dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Fantasists on Fantasy|Fantasists on Fantasy: A Collection of Critical Reflections by Eighteen Masters of the Art]]'', including two works by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], is published.
==April==
* '''[[1 April|1]]''' - ''[[The Monsters and the Critics]]'' is published in the US.
* '''[[18 April|18]]''' - [[Francis de Wolff]], who voiced [[Smaug]] in [[The Hobbit (1968 radio series)|the 1968 radio series of ''The Hobbit'']], dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Bree and the Barrow-Downs]]'' is published.

==June==
* '''[[1 June|1]]''' - ''[[Moria: The Dwarven City]]'' is published.
* '''[[6 June|6]]''' - [[Åke Ohlmarks]], Swedish translator, dies.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 21|''Mallorn'' 21]] is published.

==August==
* '''[[10 August|10]]-[[13 August|13]]''' - [[Mythcon 15]].
* '''[[16 August|16]] - ''[[The Book of Lost Tales: Part Two]]'' is published in the UK.'''

==October==
* '''[[5 October|5]]-[[7 October|7]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1984]].
==November==
* '''[[26 November|26]]''' - ''[[The Book of Lost Tales Part Two]]'' is published in the US.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 70|''Amon Hen'' 70]] is published.
==December==
* '''?''' - [[Beyond Bree December 1984|''Beyond Bree'' December 1984]] is published.
==?==
* '''?''' - [[Johan de Meij]] begins work on his ''[[Symphony No. 1 "The Lord of the Rings"]]''
* ''?'' - [[Jude Fisher|Jane Johnson]] becomes Publisher of the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] list at [[Allen and Unwin]], [[Unwin Hyman]] and [[HarperCollins]]. 
* '''?''' - ''[[Rangers of the North (book)]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Dagorlad and the Dead Marshes]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Tower of Cirith Ungol and Shelob's Lair]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Hillmen of the Trollshaws]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Manuscripts of J.R.R.T.]]'' is issued.
* '''?''' - [[Beyond Bree 1985 Tolkien Calendar]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[Tolkien Calendar 1985]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The 1985 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] is released.
